attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: This app took three weeks to download. It had so many bugs that I had to get a new phone. It is a terrible app 10/10 DO NOT recommend.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: Terrible app. I went on and it told me to go kill my grandma. May she rest in pieces❤️🕊. Also, forces you to burn your house down, while your family is inside. 😢

attributes.title: ✨d i s g u s t a n g✨
attributes.review: Don’t download the app this app is terrible, worst quality, does nothing great for no body, and is made by someone who you cannot trust. Those are red flags everywhere don’t kill yourself :) 😌💅✨

attributes.title: Do not get
attributes.review: This app wants all my information even though I said no. I have a glitch on my phone after downloading the app

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: One of the worst apps I have ever come across. The graphics are terrible and all glitchy. The app itself is slow and not at all convient to use.

attributes.title: Made me throw up
attributes.review: I download this app and saw a pic of trump which made me throw up.  I threw up so much that I had to go to the hospital.  Later I figured out I had the trump flu.  And got a lot of medication.   Pls rate this app one star

attributes.title: Almost Died 😿
attributes.review:
When I opened the app it glitched so much. It literally killed my cat that was on the floor since it’s allergic to oranges and racist 😿
Since my cat is very important to me I demand justification for my cats devastating death please but orangey 🍊to jail rn 😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡 #catlivesmatter

attributes.title: Racism
attributes.review: The app is terrible with glitches. And the whole person behind it is terrible. Would not recommend

attributes.title: Absolutely Awful ✨😡
attributes.review: I was hoping to download this app to learn about our lovely president, but was met by nothing more than an extremely glitchy app and the physical embodiment of a toaster strudel who called me ugly 😡

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: My iPad glitched so much after this, it was hard to use other apps and I still had so much storage left on my iPad, I do not recommended this app
